Class JavassistTransformerExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.icongmbh.oss.maven.plugin.javassist.JavassistTransformerExecutor

  • public class JavassistTransformerExecutor
extends Object
    Executer to perform the transformation by a list of ClassTransformer instances.
    Author:
    Uwe Barthel

      JavassistTransformerExecutor() 
      JavassistTransformerExecutor(ClassLoader classLoader)
